snippet.title: Steel Seed — Developer Gameplay Showcase
snippet.description:
Steel Seed is a single-player stealth action adventure game set in a dark science-fiction world.

In a epic journey inside a hostile facility run by AIs, Zoe will have Koby, a flying drone, as her only companion.

Save humanity, find your father and stay human until the end.

Steel Seed is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC in 2024.
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/458430/Steel_Seed/
